pageProduct.name: Aveeno Active Naturals Skin Relief Moisturising Lotion 225mL
pageProduct.description:
General Information

AVEENO® Skin Relief Moisturising Lotion 225mL

When skin is extra-dry, it can become dry and uncomfortably itchy. Aveeno Active Naturals Skin Relief Moisturising Body Lotion with cooling action and Dimethicone skin protectant, provides immediate relief and lasting moisture for very dry, itchy skin.

This soothing cream also includes menthol to cool and help relieve itchy, dry skin while providing intense moisturisation to help prevent dry skin throughout the day.


  • Non greasy and fast-absorbing

  • Menthol immediately cools to soothe itchy, extra-dry skin.

  • Clinically proven to  moisturise skin for up to 24 hours

  • Formulated with colloidal oatmeal for a deeply hydrating moisturiser



Try these other Aveeno products specifically formulated for people with dry skin: Aveeno Skin Relief Body Wash Fragrance Free, Aveeno Skin Relief Moisturising Lotion Fragrance Free, Aveeno Skin Relief Moisturising Cream.
Aveeno Active Naturals are ingredients derived from nature and uniquely formulated to reveal skin's beauty.

Essential Active Naturals: skin nourishing colloidal oatmeal.

Size: 225mL

Shelf Life in Days: 730 days

KEY FEATURES

• Skin Relief Lotion with Cooling Action
• Relief for Itchy, Extra Dry Skin
• Dermatologist Recommended
• Colloidal Oatmeal







Ingredients

Aqua, Glycerin, Distearyldimonium Chloride, Petrolatum, Isopropyl Palmitate, Cetyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour, Benzyl Alcohol, Menthol, Allantoin, Sodium Chloride, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Gluten.

Directions

Apply on skin as needed.

USAGE ADVICE

Intensively moisturises, to help relieve and temporarily protect chafed, chapped, cracked or wind burned skin.
